parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the event stream.

parameters.name: EventStreamingName
parameters.description: The name of the event stream.

parameters.name: FilterPattern
parameters.description: The rule that is used to filter events. If you leave this parameter empty, all events are matched.

parameters.name: RunOptions
parameters.description: The parameters that are configured for the runtime environment.

parameters.name: Sink
parameters.description: The event target. You must and can specify only one event target.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The event provider, which is also known as the event source. You must and can specify only one event source.
